dmca.title: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Materials
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: AMPaquette@aol.com [mailto:AMPaquette@aol.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2007 4:09 PM
To: Webmaster@damnfunnypictures.com; DMCA
Subject: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Materials

 


Dear Mr. Barnes:

     About a month ago I wrote to you asking you to remove one of our
client's
copyrighted video works from your website.  At that time, you indicated
that it was no
longer on your website, which, at that time, was true.  However, I was
just informed by
my client that it was placed there again and is currently there now,
under the exact same
URL where it was previously. 

     We would like to know who is continuing to put the copyrighted work
on your
website.  Is it you?  If so, we are asking you to remove it and for your
ISP,
Theplanet.com, to note your file accordingly.

     To remind you, our office represents the L. Ron Hubbard Library,
the owner of
the copyright to a video work entitled "Orientation."  This work is
registered with the
United States Copyright Office under registration number PA 804-464.

     The URL where this work can be found is:

     http://www.planetvids.com/html/Scientology-Orientation-Film.html

   
     Under 17 U.S.C.  106, it is unlawful to reproduce or distribute
someone else's
copyrighted work without that person's authorization.   Accordingly, I
am asking for
your help in removing this copyrighted work from your service a second
time.
     
     I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that the
posting of this
work through your system was not authorized by my client, any agent of
my client, or
the law.

     I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate and that I am
authorized to act on behalf of the L. Ron Hubbard Library in this
matter.

     I appreciate your help and prompt attention to this matter. 

Sincerely,
Ava Paquette
Moxon & Kobrin
3055 Wilshire Boulevard
Suite 900
Los Angeles, California 90010
Tel: (213) 487-4468
Fax: (213) 487-5385
